title: The Workbook : Study Guide for The GodSelf
description: "The Workbook" addresses portions of each of the 63 chapters of "The Revelation for the New Millennium" by Patricia Jepsen Chuse. "The Workbook" provides revelatory insights, summaries and highlights of major truth principles, writing exercises, meditation and practical application suggestions, affirmations, as well as questions and discussion topics for study groups.
author: Patricia Jepsen Chuse
